strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army of Space Marines from the Blood Angels Chapter.

sections.name: Blood Angels Core Detachments
sections.description: One Death Company formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Death Company
formations.units: One Chaplain, four Death Company Marines, two Death Company Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace four Death Company Marines and two Death Company Rhinos with four Death Company Assaults: Free
Replace two Death Company Rhinos with Drop Pods and add one Death Company Dreadnought: 100 points

sections.name: Blood Angels Support Detachments
sections.description: Three Support Detachments may be taken per Core Detachment.

formations.name: Land Raiders
formations.units: Three Land Raiders and/or Land Raider Redeemer
extraUnits: Add one Land Raider or Land Raider Redeemer: 75 points

formations.name: Baal Predators
formations.units: Four Baal Predator Hades or four Baal Predator Infernus

formations.name: Land Speeder
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

formations.name: Blood Angels Terminators
extraUnits: Add one unit of Terminators: 75 points

sections.name: Blood Angels Aircraft & Titan Legion Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

formations.name: Warhound Pack
extraUnits: Upgrade both Warhounds to the Tank Hunter Configuration: 50 points
Formation gains the 'Independent' special rule: 50 points

upgrades.title: Blood Angels Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment.

items.name: Attack Bikes
items.description: Replace any number of Assault Bikes with an equal number of Attack Bikes or Melta Bikes

items.name: Predators
items.description: Add up to two Baal Predator Hades and/or Baal Predator Infernus

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to three Furioso Dreadnoughts
points: 50 points for one, 75 points for two, 100 points for three

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: 0-1 Sanguinary Guard
items.description: Replace two Assaults with two Sanguinary Guards. The formation must contain a Supreme Commander

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

options.description: Upgrade one Captain in the army to a Supreme Commander

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Land Raider Transport
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders and/or Land Raider Redeemers, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give all Scouts in the formation 'Sniper' on their Heavy Bolters

items.name: Assault Terminators
items.description: Replace up to four Terminators with Assault Terminators

items.name: Typhoons
items.description: Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons
